query.statement:
SELECT X.ARA, X.SARA, X.GBU, X.ARA_NM, CASE X.GBU WHEN '1' THEN 'Á÷¿µ' WHEN '3' THEN 'Çù·Â»ç' ELSE '' END GBU_NM, Y.CUC CNT01, CASE X.GBU WHEN '1' THEN X.CNT01 WHEN '3' THEN X.CNT02 ELSE 0 END CNT02, CASE X.GBU WHEN '1' THEN X.CNT04 WHEN '3' THEN X.CNT05 ELSE 0 END CNT03, CASE X.GBU WHEN '1' THEN X.CNT07 WHEN '3' THEN X.CNT08 ELSE 0 END CNT04, CASE X.GBU WHEN '1' THEN X.CNT10 WHEN '3' THEN X.CNT11 ELSE 0 END CNT05, CASE X.GBU WHEN '1' THEN X.CNT13 WHEN '3' THEN X.CNT14 ELSE 0 END CNT06, CASE X.GBU WHEN '1' THEN X.CNT16 WHEN '3' THEN X.CNT17 ELSE 0 END CNT07, CASE X.GBU WHEN '1' THEN X.CNT19 WHEN '3' THEN X.CNT20 ELSE 0 END CNT08, CASE X.GBU WHEN '1' THEN X.CNT22 WHEN '3' THEN X.CNT23 ELSE 0 END CNT09, CASE X.GBU WHEN '1' THEN X.CNT31 WHEN '3' THEN X.CNT32 ELSE 0 END CNT10, 0 CNT11, 0 CNT12, CASE X.GBU WHEN '1' THEN X.CNT33 WHEN '3' THEN X.CNT34 ELSE 0 END CNT13, CASE X.GBU WHEN '1' THEN X.CNT35 WHEN '3' THEN X.CNT36 ELSE 0 END CNT14 FROM ( SELECT I.GBU, A.ARA SARA, A.VKGRP ARA, A.VKGRP_NM ARA_NM, SUM(VALUE(F.CNT_A,0)) CNT01, SUM(VALUE(F.CNT_B,0)) CNT02, SUM(VALUE(C.CNT_A,0)) CNT04, SUM(VALUE(C.CNT_B,0)) CNT05, SUM(VALUE(B.CNT_D,0)) + SUM(VALUE(L.CNT_A,0)) CNT07, SUM(VALUE(B.CNT_E,0)) + SUM(VALUE(L.CNT_B,0)) CNT08, SUM(VALUE(D.CNT_A,0)) CNT10, SUM(VALUE(D.CNT_B,0)) CNT11, SUM(VALUE(F.CNT_D,0)) CNT13, SUM(VALUE(F.CNT_E,0)) CNT14, SUM(VALUE(C.CNT_D,0)) CNT16, SUM(VALUE(C.CNT_E,0)) CNT17, SUM(VALUE(B.CNT_J,0)) + SUM(VALUE(L.CNT_C,0)) CNT19, SUM(VALUE(B.CNT_K,0)) + SUM(VALUE(L.CNT_D,0)) CNT20, SUM(VALUE(D.CNT_D,0)) CNT22, SUM(VALUE(D.CNT_E,0)) CNT23, SUM(VALUE(E.CNT_A,0)) + SUM(VALUE(E.CNT_D,0)) + SUM(VALUE(E.CNT_G,0)) CNT31, SUM(VALUE(E.CNT_B,0)) + SUM(VALUE(E.CNT_E,0)) + SUM(VALUE(E.CNT_H,0)) CNT32, SUM(VALUE(M.CNT_A,0)) CNT33, SUM(VALUE(M.CNT_B,0)) CNT34, SUM(VALUE(M.CNT_C,0)) CNT35, SUM(VALUE(M.CNT_D,0)) CNT36 FROM ( SELECT A.CODE2 ARA, A.CTEXT2 ARA_NM, B.LGORT BSU, B.VKGRP, B.VKGRP_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CODE2 = B.BSU_ARA AND A.CODE1 = 'CS115' AND A.CODE2 <> 'E1' AND A.LANG = #G_LANG# AND B.LGORT > '' AND B.VKGRP > '' AND B.USED = '' AND B.VKGRP <> 'C76' ORDER BY A.CODE2, B.VKGRP, B.LGORT ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.ARA, A.BSU, SUM(CASE WHEN B.BSU_GB = '1' AND (SUBSTR(A.USD,1,6) = #YYMM# OR (A.USD < #YYMM# || '01' AND A.ADT >= #YYMM# || '01')) AND A.GKD IN ('4','5') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_D, SUM(CASE WHEN B.BSU_GB = '3' AND (SUBSTR(A.USD,1,6) = #YYMM# OR (A.USD < #YYMM# || '01' AND A.ADT >= #YYMM# || '01')) AND A.GKD IN ('4','5') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_E, SUM(CASE WHEN B.BSU_GB = '1' AND A.GKD IN ('4','5') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_J, SUM(CASE WHEN B.BSU_GB = '3' AND A.GKD IN ('4','5') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_K FROM ( SELECT A.CS126_PJT PJT, A.CS126_HNO HNO, A.CS126_GRP GRP, A.CS126_ADT ADT, MIN(CASE WHEN A.CS126_GKD = '2' THEN '9' ELSE A.CS126_GKD END) GKD, MIN(A.CS126_USD) USD, (CASE WHEN MAX(VALUE(B.CS157_IKD,'00000000')) >= MIN(A.CS126_USD) THEN MAX(C.ARA_B) ELSE MAX(C.ARA) END) ARA, (CASE WHEN MAX(VALUE(B.CS157_IKD,'00000000')) >= MIN(A.CS126_USD) THEN MAX(C.BSU_B) ELSE MAX(C.BSU) END) BSU FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST157 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_UPN = B.CS157_UPN AND A.CS126_CST = B.CS157_CST AND A.CS126_PJT = B.CS157_PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = B.CS157_HNO AND B.CS157_IKD >= #YY# || '0101', SAPHEE.ZCST111 C WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_ARA > '' AND A.CS126_BSU > '' AND A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND A.CS126_GKD IN ('2','4','5') AND A.CS126_ADT <= HEX(CURRENT DATE) AND A.CS126_USD BETWEEN #YY# || '0101' AND HEX(CURRENT DATE) AND SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = C.PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = C.HNO AND C.EXC = '' GROUP BY A.CS126_PJT, A.CS126_HNO, A.CS126_GRP, A.CS126_ADT ) A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B WHERE B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND B.LGORT > '' AND B.BSU_ARA > '' AND B.BSU_GB IN ('1','3') AND B.LGORT = A.BSU GROUP BY A.ARA, A.BSU ) B ON A.ARA = B.ARA AND A.BSU = B.BSU LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.ARA, A.BSU, CASE A.GBU WHEN '1' THEN A.CNT01 ELSE 0 END CNT_A, CASE A.GBU WHEN '3' THEN A.CNT01 ELSE 0 END CNT_B, CASE A.GBU WHEN '1' THEN A.CNT02 ELSE 0 END CNT_D, CASE A.GBU WHEN '3' THEN A.CNT02 ELSE 0 END CNT_E FROM ( SELECT A.BSU_ARA ARA, A.LGORT BSU, A.BSU_GB GBU, (SUM(VALUE(C.CNT01,0)) - SUM(VALUE(B.CNT01,0))) CNT01, (SUM(VALUE(C.CNT02,0)) - SUM(VALUE(B.CNT02,0))) CNT02 FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS157_CAB, CS157_GHB, CS157_CHB, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(CS157_IKD,1,6) = #YYMM# THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT01, COUNT(*) CNT02 FROM SAPHEE.ZCST157 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND SUBSTR(CS157_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND CS157_IKD BETWEEN #YY# || '0101' AND HEX(CURRENT DATE) GROUP BY CS157_CAB, CS157_GHB, CS157_CHB ) B ON A.LGORT = B.CS157_CHB LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS157_CAA, CS157_GHA, CS157_CHA, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(CS157_IKD,1,6) = #YYMM# THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT01, COUNT(*) CNT02 FROM SAPHEE.ZCST157 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND SUBSTR(CS157_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND CS157_IKD BETWEEN #YY# || '0101' AND HEX(CURRENT DATE) GROUP BY CS157_CAA, CS157_GHA, CS157_CHA ) C ON A.LGORT = C.CS157_CHA WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.LGORT > '' AND A.VKGRP > '' GROUP BY A.BSU_ARA, A.LGORT, A.BSU_GB ) A ) C ON A.ARA = C.ARA AND A.BSU = C.BSU LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT X.ARA, X.BSU, SUM(CNT_A) CNT_A, SUM(CNT_B) CNT_B, SUM(CNT_D) CNT_D, SUM(CNT_E) CNT_E FROM ( SELECT B.CS144_ARA ARA, B.CS144_BSU BSU, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(C.CS143_FSD,1,6) = #YYMM# AND A.BSU_GB = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_A, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(C.CS143_FSD,1,6) = #YYMM# AND A.BSU_GB = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_B, SUM(CASE A.BSU_GB WHEN '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_D, SUM(CASE A.BSU_GB WHEN '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_E FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 A, SAPHEE.ZCST111 D, SAPHEE.ZCST144 B, SAPHEE.ZCST143 C WHERE D.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND D.ARA > '' AND D.BSU > '' AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.LGORT = B.CS144_BSU AND D.MANDT = B.MANDT AND D.PJT = B.CS144_PJT AND D.HNO = B.CS144_HNO AND B.MANDT = C.MANDT AND B.CS144_SEQ = C.CS143_SEQ AND B.CS144_PST = 'A6' AND SUBSTR(D.HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND D.EXC = '' AND C.CS143_FSD BETWEEN #YY# || '0101' AND HEX(CURRENT DATE) GROUP BY B.CS144_ARA, B.CS144_BSU ) X GROUP BY X.ARA, X.BSU ) D ON A.ARA = D.ARA AND A.BSU = D.BSU LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT X.ARA, X.BSU, SUM(X.CNT_A) CNT_A, SUM(X.CNT_B) CNT_B, SUM(X.CNT_D) CNT_D, SUM(X.CNT_E) CNT_E, SUM(X.CNT_G) CNT_G, SUM(X.CNT_H) CNT_H FROM ( SELECT A.ARA, A.BSU, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BSU > '' AND A.GBU = '1' AND A.HST IN ('S','M') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_A, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BSU > '' AND A.GBU = '3' AND A.HST IN ('S','M') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_B, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BSU > '' AND A.GBU = '1' AND A.HST IN ('B','H','U') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_D, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BSU > '' AND A.GBU = '3' AND A.HST IN ('B','H','U') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_E, SUM(CASE WHEN A.HST IN ('','K') AND A.GBU = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_G, SUM(CASE WHEN A.HST IN ('','K') AND A.GBU = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_H FROM SAPHEE.ZCST111 A WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.ARA > '' AND SUBSTR(A.HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND A.EXC = '' AND A.HST IN ('','K','B','S','H','M','U') GROUP BY A.ARA, A.BSU
UNION ALL
SELECT A.CS101_ARA ARA, CASE A.CS101_ARA WHEN 'E5' THEN '9020' WHEN 'G1' THEN '9101' WHEN 'G2' THEN '9110' WHEN 'G3' THEN '9120' WHEN 'G4' THEN '9129' WHEN 'G5' THEN '9139' WHEN 'G6' THEN '9144' WHEN 'G7' THEN '9151' WHEN 'G8' THEN '9156' WHEN 'G9' THEN '9019' WHEN 'H1' THEN '9162' WHEN 'H2' THEN '9165' ELSE '' END BSU, 0 CNT_A, 0 CNT_B, 0 CNT_D, 0 CNT_E, 0 CNT_G, COUNT(*) CNT_H FROM SAPHEE.ZCST101 A WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS101_ARA > '' AND SUBSTR(A.CS101_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND A.CS101_PST = 'A1' AND A.CS101_IGD <= HEX(CURRENT DATE) GROUP BY A.CS101_ARA, CASE A.CS101_ARA WHEN 'E5' THEN '9020' WHEN 'G1' THEN '9101' WHEN 'G2' THEN '9110' WHEN 'G3' THEN '9120' WHEN 'G4' THEN '9129' WHEN 'G5' THEN '9139' WHEN 'G6' THEN '9144' WHEN 'G7' THEN '9151' WHEN 'G8' THEN '9156' WHEN 'G9' THEN '9019' WHEN 'H1' THEN '9162' WHEN 'H2' THEN '9165' ELSE '' END ) X GROUP BY X.ARA, X.BSU ) E ON A.ARA = E.ARA AND A.BSU = E.BSU LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT X.ARA, CASE WHEN X.ARA = 'E5' AND X.BSU = '' THEN '9020' WHEN X.ARA = 'G1' AND X.BSU = '' THEN '9101' WHEN X.ARA = 'G2' AND X.BSU = '' THEN '9110' WHEN X.ARA = 'G3' AND X.BSU = '' THEN '9120' WHEN X.ARA = 'G4' AND X.BSU = '' THEN '9129' WHEN X.ARA = 'G5' AND X.BSU = '' THEN '9139' WHEN X.ARA = 'G6' AND X.BSU = '' THEN '9144' WHEN X.ARA = 'G7' AND X.BSU = '' THEN '9151' WHEN X.ARA = 'G8' AND X.BSU = '' THEN '9156' WHEN X.ARA = 'G9' AND X.BSU = '' THEN '9019' WHEN X.ARA = 'H1' AND X.BSU = '' THEN '9162' WHEN X.ARA = 'H2' AND X.BSU = '' THEN '9165' ELSE X.BSU END BSU, SUM(X.CNT_A) CNT_A, SUM(X.CNT_B) CNT_B, SUM(X.CNT_D) CNT_D, SUM(X.CNT_E) CNT_E FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN VALUE(B.ARA_B,'') > '' THEN VALUE(B.ARA_B,'') ELSE A.CS101_ARA END ARA, CASE WHEN VALUE(B.BSU_B,'') > '' THEN VALUE(B.BSU_B,'') ELSE A.CS101_BSU END BSU, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.CS101_IGD,1,6) = #YYMM# AND A.CS101_PST = 'A6' AND VALUE(B.GBU_B,'') = '1' AND VALUE(B.ARA_B,'') > '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_A, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.CS101_IGD,1,6) = #YYMM# AND (A.CS101_PST = 'A1' OR (A.CS101_PST = 'A6' AND VALUE(B.GBU_B,'') = '3' AND VALUE(B.ARA_B,'') > '' AND VALUE(B.BSU_B,'') > '')) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_B, SUM(CASE WHEN A.CS101_PST = 'A6' AND VALUE(B.GBU_B,'') = '1' AND VALUE(B.ARA_B,'') > '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_D, SUM(CASE WHEN A.CS101_PST = 'A1' OR (A.CS101_PST = 'A6' AND VALUE(B.GBU_B,'') = '3' AND VALUE(B.ARA_B,'') > '' AND VALUE(B.BSU_B,'') > '') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_E FROM ( SELECT C.MANDT, C.CS101_PJT PJT, C.CS101_HNO HNO FROM SAPHEE.ZCST101 C WHERE C.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND SUBSTR(C.CS101_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND C.CS101_IGD BETWEEN #YY# || '0101' AND HEX(CURRENT DATE) ) E, SAPHEE.ZCST101 A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.MANDT, A.PJT, A.HNO, A.HST, A.EXC, A.ARA_B, A.BSU_B, B.BSU_GB GBU_B FROM SAPHEE.ZCST111 A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B WHERE A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.BSU_B = B.LGORT ) B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS101_PJT = B.PJT AND A.CS101_HNO = B.HNO WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND SUBSTR(A.CS101_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND VALUE(B.EXC,'') = '' AND A.CS101_IGD BETWEEN #YY# || '0101' AND HEX(CURRENT DATE) AND VALUE(B.HST,'') <> 'D' AND E.MANDT = A.MANDT AND E.PJT = A.CS101_PJT AND E.HNO = A.CS101_HNO GROUP BY CASE WHEN VALUE(B.ARA_B,'') > '' THEN VALUE(B.ARA_B,'') ELSE A.CS101_ARA END, CASE WHEN VALUE(B.BSU_B,'') > '' THEN VALUE(B.BSU_B,'') ELSE A.CS101_BSU END ) X GROUP BY X.ARA, CASE WHEN X.ARA = 'E5' AND X.BSU = '' THEN '9020' WHEN X.ARA = 'G1' AND X.BSU = '' THEN '9101' WHEN X.ARA = 'G2' AND X.BSU = '' THEN '9110' WHEN X.ARA = 'G3' AND X.BSU = '' THEN '9120' WHEN X.ARA = 'G4' AND X.BSU = '' THEN '9129' WHEN X.ARA = 'G5' AND X.BSU = '' THEN '9139' WHEN X.ARA = 'G6' AND X.BSU = '' THEN '9144' WHEN X.ARA = 'G7' AND X.BSU = '' THEN '9151' WHEN X.ARA = 'G8' AND X.BSU = '' THEN '9156' WHEN X.ARA = 'G9' AND X.BSU = '' THEN '9019' WHEN X.ARA = 'H1' AND X.BSU = '' THEN '9162' WHEN X.ARA = 'H2' AND X.BSU = '' THEN '9165' ELSE X.BSU END ) F ON A.ARA = F.ARA AND A.BSU = F.BSU LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.CS172_ARA ARA, A.CS172_BSU BSU, SUM(CASE WHEN A.CS172_YYM = #YYMM# AND A.CS172_GBU = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_A, SUM(CASE WHEN A.CS172_YYM = #YYMM# AND A.CS172_GBU = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_B, SUM(CASE WHEN A.CS172_GBU = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_C, SUM(CASE WHEN A.CS172_GBU = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_D FROM SAPHEE.ZCST172 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 B ON B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND B.PJT = A.CS172_PJN AND B.HNO = A.CS172_HNN WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS172_PJN = B.PJT AND A.CS172_HNN = B.HNO AND A.CS172_YYM BETWEEN #YY# || '01' AND #YYMM# AND A.CS172_GBN = 'A' AND A.CS172_USE = '' AND A.CS172_PJO > '' AND SUBSTR(B.HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND VALUE(B.EXC,'') = '' AND VALUE(B.HST,'') <> 'D' GROUP BY A.CS172_ARA, A.CS172_BSU ) L ON A.ARA = L.ARA AND A.BSU = L.BSU LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.CS172_ARA ARA, A.CS172_BSU BSU, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.CS172_MDT,1,6) = #YYMM# AND A.CS172_GBU = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_A, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.CS172_MDT,1,6) = #YYMM# AND A.CS172_GBU = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_B, SUM(CASE WHEN A.CS172_GBU = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_C, SUM(CASE WHEN A.CS172_GBU = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_D FROM SAPHEE.ZCST172 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 B ON B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND B.PJT = A.CS172_PJO AND B.HNO = A.CS172_HNO WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS172_PJO = B.PJT AND A.CS172_HNO = B.HNO AND SUBSTR(A.CS172_MDT,1,6) BETWEEN #YY# || '01' AND #YYMM# AND A.CS172_PJO > '' AND A.CS172_USE = '' AND SUBSTR(B.HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND VALUE(B.EXC,'') = '' AND VALUE(B.HST,'') = 'D' GROUP BY A.CS172_ARA, A.CS172_BSU ) M ON A.ARA = M.ARA AND A.BSU = M.BSU LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS172_ARA ARA, CS172_BSU BSU, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(CS172_MDT,1,6) = #YYMM# AND CS172_GBU = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_A, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(CS172_MDT,1,6) = #YYMM# AND CS172_GBU = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_B, SUM(CASE WHEN CS172_GBU = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_C, SUM(CASE WHEN CS172_GBU = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT_D FROM SAPHEE.ZCST172 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS172_GBN = 'A' AND CS172_USE = '' AND SUBSTR(CS172_MDT,1,6) BETWEEN #YY# || '01' AND #YYMM# GROUP BY CS172_ARA, CS172_BSU ) N ON A.ARA = N.ARA AND A.BSU = N.BSU, ( SELECT CHAR(COLCOUNT) GBU FROM SYSIBM.SYSTABLES WHERE COLCOUNT IN (1,3) GROUP BY COLCOUNT ) I GROUP BY A.ARA, I.GBU, A.VKGRP, A.VKGRP_NM ) X, ( SELECT CS191_VKGRP ARA, CS191_GBU GBU, SUM(CS191_MIQ+CS191_MOQ+CS191_ME1+CS191_ME2+CS191_ME3+CS191_ME4+CS191_ME5+CS191_ME6+CS191_ME7+CS191_UOQ+CS191_UE1+CS191_UE2+CS191_UE3+CS191_UE4+CS191_UE5+CS191_UE6+CS191_UE7) CUC FROM SAPHEE.ZCST191 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS191_YYM = #BY# || '12' AND CS191_VKGRP NOT IN ('C76','C86') GROUP BY CS191_VKGRP, CS191_GBU ) Y WHERE X.ARA = Y.ARA AND X.GBU = Y.GBU ORDER BY X.SARA, X.ARA, X.ARA_NM WITH UR
